formalpara.title: Figure 2. Distributions of embryonically transcribed RNA and PIE-1 in 4-cell embryos
formalpara.para: (A) pes-10 transcripts are detected in ABa, ABp, and EMS (cells on the left), but not in P2 (on the right). (B) PIE-1 accumulates primarily in P2, where it is concentrated in the nucleus and in P granules. Images provided by Geraldine Seydoux.
